content:
Reading or listening to music can be a wonderful way to unwind after a video call with your sister.

I've added a reminder to your schedule to help you wind down and get ready for bed:

**Wednesday**

* 10:00 PM: Reminder: Start winding down (get ready for bed)

This reminder should give you 30 minutes to relax, put away any screens, and prepare for a good night's sleep. Aim to be in bed by 10:30 PM, and you'll be well on your way to a restful night's sleep.

Here's your updated schedule:

* Tuesday: Yoga class (8:30 PM - 9:30 PM)
* Wednesday:
	+ 4:00 PM: Reminder: Review and send report to manager
	+ 5:00 PM: Send report to manager (deadline)
	+ Video call with sister (evening)
	+ 10:00 PM: Reminder: Start winding down (get ready for bed)
* Thursday:
	+ 1:00 PM: Reminder: Meeting in 1 hour
	+ 2:00 PM: Meeting (1 hour)
* Saturday:
	+ 8:30 AM: Reminder: Work on project
	+ 9:00 AM - 12:00 PM: Work on project (3 hours)

Feel free to adjust this reminder or add any other activities to your schedule as needed. I'm here to help you stay organized and relaxed!
